mapper.insert: insert into tradeorder (id, equipmentid, transactional_number, settleBankName, settleCardNo, payType, cardType, tradetype, money, fee, settleMoney, createdAt, updatedAt) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{transactionalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlebankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settlecardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tradetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settlemoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tradeorder set equipmentid = #{equipmentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, transactional_number = #{transactionalNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settleBankName = #{settlebankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, settleCardNo = #{settlecardno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payType = #{paytype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cardType = #{cardtype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tradetype = #{tradetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, fee = #{fee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, settleMoney = #{settlemoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, createdAt = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatedAt = #{updatedat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, equipmentid, transactional_number, settleBankName, settleCardNo, payType, cardType, tradetype, money, fee, settleMoney, createdAt, updatedAt from tradeorder where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
